name: Shakedown: Hawaii
overview: The Wii version include all of the currently released content and feature updates, including the Mogul Update, the Full Tank Update, and the many other little tweaks, improvements and optimizations that went into the game post-launch. It will also allow you to experience the game in the most retro way possible... in 4:3 on your old CRT televisions. The Wii version supports both 50hz and 60hz, and both NTSC and PAL output. It supports the Wii Remote (with shake!), Wii Classic Controller, Wii Classic Controller Pro, and GameCube Controller.
